data.name: Schoolgirl Strikers: Raid! SF Super Plan
data.short_description: Altair Torte deploys to investigate a strange O'bli signature. The location of the signature is deep in the mountains, with a beautiful lake, and the team starts wanting to enjoy the scenery while they're on their mission. Yuumi loves to cook, and is enticed by the large amount of mountain vegetable
data.supported_languages:
English*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
